Package it.uniroma1.mdp.juno.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.uniroma1.mdp.juno.model.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Observable
This class implements basic player behavior for both AI and human
Author:
Sebastiano Deodati
